Banner.Description: As a Software Engineer, I specialize in both client-side and server-side technologies, covering the entire development life cycle to deliver robust, business-driven mobile solutions.
MainTech.Title: Main Skills & Education
SecondTech.Title: Well known
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I specialize in mobile development, crafting engaging and responsive mobile interfaces. With expertise in Android, iOS, Flutter and React Native, I build cross-platform applications that deliver a seamless, native-like user experience.

My strong sense of design and usability ensures that every app I develop is intuitive and user-friendly. I excel at transforming complex concepts into dynamic, high-performance mobile applications, consistently prioritizing exceptional user experiences.
On the back end, I have experience developing scalable and efficient APIs and services using .NET Core and Azure, ensuring robust and reliable application architecture.

FeatureMobileProjects.Title: Mobile Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureMobileProjects.Projects.Title: Instagram Clone
FeatureMobileProjects.Projects.Description: Instagram Clone is a social media app built with React Native, designed to replicate the core features of Instagram, including photo uploads, user profiles, and interactive stories. This app supports iOS, Android, and web platforms, providing a responsive and engaging experience for users.

FeatureMobileProjects.Projects.Title: Rent2Park
FeatureMobileProjects.Projects.Description: Rent2Park is a technology platform that matches drivers with private parking on driveways, garages, land & EV spaces from our private host database.

FeatureMobileProjects.Projects.Title: Split Payment
FeatureMobileProjects.Projects.Description: It's a payment system where you can transfer money in any currency to your family and friends

InConstruction.Title: In Construction..
OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Notes with SwiftUI
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Notes is a simple and intuitive note-taking app developed for iOS using SwiftUI. The app allows users to create, edit, and delete notes with ease, providing a seamless experience with a modern, clean interface.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: ToDoApp with Jetpack Componse
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: ToDoApp is a simple yet powerful task management application built using Jetpack Compose for modern Android development. The app allows users to easily create, edit, and manage their tasks with a clean and intuitive interface.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: GameStrem
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: GameStream is a real-time game streaming app that allows users to stream their favorite games directly from their devices. Developed using Swift and SwiftUI, this app provides a smooth, high-performance experience with a modern and intuitive user interface.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Platzi Wallet
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Wallet is a simple and secure Android app designed to help users manage their finances, store payment methods, and keep track of transactions. Built with XML layouts and Java/Kotlin for Android development, this app ensures a smooth user experience and easy navigation.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Platzi Tweets
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: PlatziTweets is an iOS app built with UIKit that allows users to view, post, and interact with tweets in real-time. It provides a sleek and responsive interface for users to manage their Twitter feed and share content with friends.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Facebook Clone
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FacebookClone is an iOS app that replicates the basic functionality of Facebook. Built using UIKit, the app allows users to post updates, like and comment on posts, and interact with friends. It provides a sleek, intuitive user interface similar to the core features of the Facebook app.

Contact.Title: Connect with Me!
Contact.Content: If you're interested in discussing new opportunities, please feel free to reach out. I'll respond promptly upon receiving your message.
